tips.title: Shrink Portions
tips.description: Offer smaller portions to reduce overwhelm. Your child can always ask for more.

tips.title: Praise Any Tasting
tips.description: Celebrate even small bites or tastes. Positive reinforcement builds confidence.

tips.title: Keep Table Uncluttered
tips.description: Remove distractions and keep the eating area simple and focused.

tips.title: Offer Food Choices
tips.description: Give your child some control by offering 2-3 healthy options.

tips.title: Eat Together
tips.description: Model healthy eating habits by sharing meals as a family when possible.

tips.title: Use Gentle Pressure
tips.description: Encourage without forcing. 'Would you like to try a small bite?'

tips.title: Create Meal Routines
tips.description: Establish consistent meal times and pre-meal rituals to build predictability.

tips.title: Celebrate Progress
tips.description: Focus on improvements, no matter how small. Every step forward counts.

tips.title: Reduce Mealtime Stress
tips.description: Keep the atmosphere calm and positive. Avoid power struggles over food.

tips.title: Involve Your Child
tips.description: Let them help with meal prep, setting the table, or choosing ingredients.
